content.prompt: In lines 7-8 (<u>Nec</u> . . . <u>altae</u>), we learn that Juno

choices.label: feared that the Carthaginians were anxious about the stability of their walls
thought that Venus was feared by the Carthaginians in their homes
suspected that the high walls of Carthage would fall on the homes
believed that Venus considered the houses of Carthage suspect and feared its walls

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
